h3_39: Southern Illinois University School of Medicine
span_48: Southern Illinois University School of Medicine
p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_67: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*

th_96: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_99: We have weekly digital image conference, resident-led reading review and faculty-led lectures. We have a twice monthly journal club. We have monthly grand rounds sessions, basic science review, and melanoma multidisciplinary conference. We have a longitudinal derm surgery curriculum that starts PGY2 year. We have a 3 year rolling dermatoethics curriculum. And we have dedicated time for the pursuit of scholarly activity, as well as self-directed administration time for faculty and residents.

p_341: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
